name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 27, the Luohu District Education Bureau of Shenzhen
Parents of children entering junior high school requested an increase in "places".
It is said that due to the second-child policy in previous years, the number of school-age children in the school district increased this year, which resulted in some parents buying school district housing but their children ultimately did not have a place in school.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
After years of preparation, the Chengdu Universiade is finally about to open. 
However, an international sports event that should have been lively and exciting has become a tense event due to inexplicably strict security. 
What are they afraid of?
